startScreenOptions.title: 《搭巴士》Taking The Bus (Child, Lv 1): Interactive Video

params.taskDescription:
將單詞拖到正確嘅方格內。

zoeng1 daan1 ci4 to1 dou3 zing3 kok3 ge3 fong1 gaak3 noi6.

Drag the words into the correct boxes.

params.textField:
首先， 我*起身 hei2 san1*
sau2 sin1, ngo5 ___. 
First, I ___.

然後， 我*換衫 wun6 saam1*
jin4 hau6, ngo5 ___. 
Then, I ___.

跟住， 我*食包 sik6 baau1*
gan1 zyu6, ngo5 ___. 
After that, I ___.

最後， 我*搭車 daap3 ce1*
zeoi3 hau6, ngo5 ___. 
Finally, I ___.

choices.question:
邊個同你搭巴士?

bin1 go3 tung4 nei5 daap3 baa1 si2?

Who went on the bus with you?
answers:
媽媽 maa4 maa1 Mom

爸爸 baa4 baa1 Dad

婆婆 po4 po2 Grandma

爺爺 je4 je2 Grandpa

params.question:
十分鐘之後有巴士.

sap6 fan1 zung1 zi1 hau6 jau5 baa1 si2.

There is a bus after 10 minutes.

l10n.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
l10n.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

choices.question:
如果架巴士唔嚟，佢哋會搭乜嘢交通工具?

jyu4 gwo2 gaa2 baa1 si2 m4 lai4, keoi5 dei6 wui5 daap3 mat1 je5 gaau1 tung1 gung1 geoi6?

What transportation will they take if the bus doesn't come?
answers:
地鐵 dei6 tit3 Subway/MTR

船 syun4 Boat/Ferry

飛機 fei1 gei1 Airplane

單車 daan1 ce1 Bicycle

choices.question:
邊個畀位你坐?

bin1 go3 bei2 wai2 nei5 co5?

Who gave up their seat for you?
answers:
叔叔 suk1 suk1 Uncle

姨姨 ji1 ji1 Aunt

同學 tung4 hok6 Schoolmate

朋友 pang4 jau5 Friend

l10n.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
l10n.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

metadata.title: Single Choice Set: Who gave up their seat for you?
metadata.extraTitle: Single Choice Set: Who gave up their seat for you?

choices.question:
你同叔叔講乜嘢？

nei5 tung4 suk1 suk1 gong2 mat1 je5?

What did you say to Uncle?
answers:
多謝 do1 ze6 Thank you 

唔好意思 m4 hou2 ji3 si3 Excuse me/Sorry

唔緊要 m4 gan2 jiu3 No problem

好呀 hou2 aa3 Great

params.question:
架巴士企滿晒人.

gaa3 baa1 si2 kei5 mun5 saai3 jan4.

The bus is full of people.

metadata.title: True/False Question: Is the bus full?
metadata.extraTitle: True/False Question: Is the bus full?

choices.question:
巴士啲人點叫你？

ba1 si2 di1 jan4 dim2 giu3 nei5?

What did the people on the bus call you?
answers:
叻女 lek1 neoi2 Good girl

叻仔 lek1 zai2 Good boy

靚仔 leng3 zai2 Pretty boy

靚女 leng3 neoi2 Pretty girl

最後冇巴士。

zeoi3 hau6 mou5 baa1 si2.

In the end, there was no bus.

ngo5 mou5 wei2 co5, jau6 __ zyu6 go3 daai6 syu1 baau1, m4 hai6 gam3 hoi1 sam1.

I don't have a seat to sit at, and I have to _____ a big backpack. I'm not very happy.
